Name: Funky Pirate Daiquiri
Ingredients: 15 ml Chilled water reduce if wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: Spirituous enough for a pirate. Why the name? Well, one of the rums has some 'funk', both rums have nautical connections, the lime protects against scurvy, the cinnamon schnapps liqueur has pieces of gold and grenadine is blood red. Well, seemed appropriate to me!
Nutrition: One serving of Funky Pirate Daiquiri contains 184 calories
